title: Flying among the weeds
creator_credit: Australia. Dept. of Defence and Vincent Donovan
brief_description: This video examines the risks of low flying by Australian army pilots, men trained to use the agility and mobility of frail, light aircraft on a battle field to help groundforces fight and win a battle. These men fly Bell 206B helicopters and Pelartus Porter and Nomad fixed wing planes.
